Content.Text:
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo! I heard you were renovating your house, so I
came by to lend a hand.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, let's get to work! I'll give you some
pointers as we go, so do like I tell you, 'kay?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good job! That's a fine piece of work you've
done.
<PAGE>
Anyway, I'll be headin' on home, then.

Yay! My house is finally renovated just the way I
want it! Let's check out the inside!
